comments: Not all even numbers arise as cototient values: see A005278.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Table[(2 n - EulerPhi[2 n]), {n, 1, 80}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 27 2013 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = 2*n - eulerphi(2*n) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 26 2013(MAGMA) [2*n-EulerPhi(2*n): n in [1..80]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 28 2013
